page.title: 11LEISURE TIME IN ST.NINIANS
page.content: In our area we have sports like {tennis,table tennis,netball,badminton, {squash,basketball,swimming and {volleyball.}There are three tennis clubs in our area Kings Park, Laurelhill and Livilands. At Kings Park for 6 weeks it would cost you Â£4:50.You have to bring with you your gymshoes,a tracksuit and a tennis racket.The tennis balls are provided for you.The name of the coach is Mr.Stirling.At the Laurelhill tennis courts it costs Â£10 for a year. For the Livilands it costs Â£10 for juvenilles and Â£20 for adults.The {cricket club}next to St.Ninians Primary School.It costs Â£5 for most of the summer.Beside the Livilands is a {bowling green}which is just beside the dual carriageway.The fees are Â£11 for women and Â£15 for men.For competitive {fencing}you need a licence.(C.BROWN.)
